About

We support Blockchain StartUps globally.

We are an accelerator focused exclusively on startups building Blockchain solutions. We provide initial funding, mentorship, and advisory support to Blockchain projects.

Our team of specialized consultants join each venture to complement the prerequisite skills in product management and growth hacking as well as operation. We work using proven methodologies to deliver on core strategy, win customers and operate smarter efficiencies and scale faster.

Our Roadmap_

1.

Discover

    Discover the route to success, starting with on-site workshops including a review of detailed flows and activity, plus controls and exceptions planning, through to dependency mapping. We introduce you to your mentors who will help you to get your startup to success.

2.

Plan

    Creation of detailed Business Plans and Target Operating Models, typically including initial vendor/partner selection & procurement, in each of the selected initiatives considering all aspects of commercial, business, technology and risk in some detail to get robust scoping for signoff and funding.

3.

Effect

    The approved initiatives are moved from plans into reality, quickly and efficiently realising the planned market, revenue and profit advantages. Structured program management methodology and Governance - measuring the KPI/CPI, Risks & Issues.

4.

Investment / Tokensale

    Token sales are used to sell and issue tokens that grant the buyer (investor) a certain benefit or certain rights. We help you to structure your tokensale, tokenomics, regulatory framework and introduce you to potential investors.
